author: auto_generator
title: 希慎上半年香港寫字樓業務組合收入跌逾2%　出租率升至92%
text:
希慎興業上半年商舖業務組合營業額上升2.1%至8.6億元，當中香港升0.8%，出租率較去年底增加2個百分點至94%。集團說，上半年續約、租金檢討與新出租物業的租金水平維持顯著上升趨勢，零售方面為應對消費者不斷演變的需求，一直致力更新品牌組合。
內地商舖業務營業額1100萬元，出租率大升23個百分點至64%。
寫字樓業務方面，希慎利園區寫字樓組合的續約、租金檢討及新出租物業的平均租金水平仍然向下。集團說上半年香港寫字樓市道仍舊充滿挑戰，寫字樓業務組合收入跌2.4%，出租率92%，較去年底增加2個百分點。利園八期預計將於明年內竣工。
內地寫字樓業務組合營業額4700萬元，按年升96%，因為出租率升至68%，較去年底上升2個百分點。
集團又指，住宅業務的續約、租金檢討與新訂立租約的平均租金水平向上，又指香港高端住宅市場氣氛輕微改善，受定價具競爭力的新樓盤所帶動，將繼續貫徹進取的銷售策略以保持穩定銷情。
至於土瓜灣庇利街及榮光街交界的市建局住宅項目上蓋工程正全速進行，商舖部分的混凝土工程將於今季完成。整體發展項目預計將於2027年第2季取得入伙紙。
至6月底止，集團按淨債務與權益比率計算的負債率微升至32.9%。
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->construction and property

author: @GDS_it
title: Giarre, furto nella chiesa Regina Pacis: bottino di oltre cinquemila euro - Giornale di Sicilia
text: Sarebbe di circa cinquemila euro l’ammontare del furto subito dalla comunità parrocchiale Regina Pacis di Giarre. Secondo una prima ricostruzione, ignoti malviventi si sarebbero introdotti nella notte all'interno del luogo sacro ed avrebbero arraffato una serie di oggetti religiosi il cui valore complessivo ammonterebbe a oltre 5.000 euro. A fare l’amara scoperta stamani è stato Salvo Mancuso, consigliere parrocchiale, che ha aperto le porte ed ha trovato i locali sottosopra. Profanato anche il tabernacolo, contenente le ostie consacrate. Tra i valori trafugati ci sarebbero paramenti, calici, pissidi, ampolline, l’aspersorio, altri oggetti in ottone e argento ed una cassa bluetooth. A seguito dell’amara sorpresa è stato chiesto l’intervento dei carabinieri della compagnia di Giarre che hanno verificato la presenza di telecamere nelle immediate vicinanze della chiesa. Previsto a breve un nuovo intervento dei militari dell’arma per compiere i rilievi e verificare se i ladri abbiano lasciato impronte. Avvisati anche padre Taddeo Ambet, parroco della chiesa, in questo momento fuori sede, e il vescovo di Acireale. L’episodio ha creato sconcerto in tutta la comunità parrocchiale. Rammarico del presidente del consiglio comunale, Giovanni Barbagallo, che ha dichiarato : «Rubare in una chiesa è un atto vile e vergognoso. Subire un furto è sempre odioso ma lo diventa ancor di più quando questo viene commesso a danno di una parrocchia privata di paramenti e oggettistica sacra spesso donata dai fedeli stessi. Esprimo profonda vicinanza e solidarietà nei confronti dei padri bocconisti e di tutta la comunità parrocchiale di Regina Pacis. L’augurio è che le forze dell’ordine, sempre presenti e attive sul territorio, riescano a rintracciare e ad assicurare alla giustizia i responsabili».

author: News Traffic Weather
title: DC area gets rare glimpse of northern lights
text:
Aurora visible from the Chain Bridge in the District. (WTOP/Dave Dildine) Aurora visible from the Chain Bridge in the District. (WTOP/Dave Dildine) Wow, oh WOW!
Aurora lit up the D.C.-area sky Thursday night, just as predicted by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Space Weather Prediction Center and relayed in my previous story . The event did achieve the G3 (Strong) and G4 (Severe) levels to produce amazing and worldwide aurora. The geomagnetic storm almost reached the G5 (Extreme) level, but not quite.
Getting to G5, the highest level, really didn’t matter, as the aurora started to appear as soon as it got dark. Veteran and rookie aurora chasers throughout the region shared with WTOP and on social media their reactions and wonderful images.
See photos of the aurora in DC and around the world here What was amazing to me was that the Aurora could be seen visually at times and easily imaged with any camera, including smartphones. Even downtown D.C. and Fairfax County chasers posted images showing the northern lights easily winning against the city lights of the National Mall, the U.S. Capitol and elsewhere.
My own viewing experience in Greene County, Virginia, near Shenandoah National Park — a preferred site for aurora chasers — was simply delightful, as a variety of aurora configurations were visible. Red and green patches, curtains and, most jaw dropping, a stable auroral red arc almost right overhead!
I saw and captured my first SAR arc last year at Shenandoah. This time, the arc was almost directly overhead and spanned the entire sky from the northwest to the southeast. I was so excited, good thing no one else was around.
The bad news is that if you missed this auroral sky show, it is most likely over for now, as the Space Weather Prediction Center forecast shows geomagnetic levels are at G1 (Minor) or very minimal the next couple days.
The good news is that the sun is nearing solar maximum for solar cycle 25 and is expected to keep producing solar events that lead to geomagnetic storms that lead to aurora!
But no need to fret if you’re still bummed about missing the northern lights Thursday night. There might be a comet sighting over the weekend!
Oh, and be sure to read my story on the comet that we hope to see this weekend .
Follow Greg Redfern on Facebook , X and his daily blog to keep up with the latest news in astronomy and space exploration.

author: EP
title: Un ataque armado en Nixeria deixa polo menos trece mortos
text: Violencia Un ataque armado en Nixeria deixa polo menos trece mortos EP Polo menos trece persoas morreron [ nun ataque perpetrado por parte de homes armados na comunidade Anguwan Mai-Xiro, que se atopa entre as localidades de Rafi e Shiro, no estado nixeriano de Níxer, no centro do país africano.](/tags/muerte/) O ataque, que tivo lugar o mércores pola noite, foi condenado polo gobernador en funcións de Níxer, Yajubu Garba, quen describiu os feitos como "satánicos, insensibles e atroces". "É moi desalentador e perturbador que outros seres humanos leven a cabo un [acto tan bárbaro e cruel](/tags/violencia/)", reza un comunicado. O gobernador reafirmou "a determinación e compromiso inquebrantables" de "controlar a onda de inseguridade no Estado", mentres que alentou ás forzas de seguridade a "non desanimarse polos ataques ás comunidades", asegurándolles "todo o apoio". O nordés de Nixeria [ é o epicentro das actividades de Boko Haram e a súa escisión, Estado Islámico en África Occidental (ISWA), aínda que a inseguridade estendeuse a outras zonas do centro, o norte e o noroeste, facendo saltar as alarmas sobre a posible expansión destas redes terroristas e criminais.](/tags/nigeria/) [RRSS WhatsApp](https://api.whatsapp.com/send?text=null%20https://galego.elcorreogallego.es/mundo/2024/08/23/ataque-armado-nigeria-deja-trece-107272661.html%3Futm_source%3Dwhatsapp%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share) [RRSS Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://galego.elcorreogallego.es/mundo/2024/08/23/ataque-armado-nigeria-deja-trece-107272661.html%3Futm_source%3Dfacebook%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share) [RRSS Twitter](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?original_referer=https://galego.elcorreogallego.es/mundo/2024/08/23/ataque-armado-nigeria-deja-trece-107272661.html&text=null%20https://galego.elcorreogallego.es/mundo/2024/08/23/ataque-armado-nigeria-deja-trece-107272661.html%3Futm_source%3Dtwitter%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share%20a%20trav%C3%A9s%20de%20%40elcorreogallego) [RRSS email](mailto:?subject=null&body=https://galego.elcorreogallego.es/mundo/2024/08/23/ataque-armado-nigeria-deja-trece-107272661.html%3Futm_source%3Dmail%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share) [Copiar URL](javascript:%20void(0)) -
